channel.title: Transaction STUCK
channel.description:
I made a transaction from my wallet to latoken … it is pending but i am waiting for weeks now:
Status: 21100 confirmations Date: 25.05.2020 09:40 Debit: -0.0000559 BAY To: BEJAbiJcju5KL7VxddbuuBM39RgyjF63qq Debit: -12,650.00 BAY Transaction fee: -0.05 BAY Net amount: -12,650.0500559 BAY Transaction ID: f0b4d48033bbd95f0e21abf2478dc118fb49068d6e187e9bd5283ccd6323abd2
What can I do?!?

item.title: Transaction STUCK
item.dc:creator: @proteanman Protean Man
item.description:
@proteanman wrote:

I have a few support threads on this site with zero answers from them. You are absolutely right, this is frustrating. It makes me want to sell every coin I have and leave this project. I even have a support question asking how to do that since it seems impossible to sell even one coin at the listed price. Everyone seems forced to sell at the BAYR price which is fractions of what BAY is.

@support needs to either take the community seriously or they will lose everything

Read full topic

item.title: Transaction STUCK
item.dc:creator: @voidindex voidindex
item.description:
@voidindex wrote:

and worst of it all … the support did not answer … they just ignore me - AWESOME!

Read full topic

item.title: Transaction STUCK
item.dc:creator: @voidindex voidindex
item.description:
@voidindex wrote:

First i tried to send the liquid tokens … this transaction got canceled and all my bay got transformed to reserve tokens … but that is not the point! my transaction still needs confirmations … it is over a month now … and i still see it in my wallet … it is a joke! really

Read full topic

item.title: Transaction STUCK
item.dc:creator: @proteanman Protean Man
item.description:
@proteanman wrote:

Tokens are frozen for a month. You sent reserve tokens correct? not liquid tokens?
I am frustrated by this as well. It is a built in mechanic with BAY.

Read full topic
